titleStmt.title: The loving husband and prudent wife represented in the persons of St. Eustachius and Theopista, martyrs / written in Italian by John Baptista Manzini and Englished by John Burbery.
titleStmt.author: Manzini, Giovanni Battista, 1599-1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Martin and J. Allestrye,

notesStmt.note: "The historie is confirmed by Baronius with the testimony of Greek and Latin authors."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
